snippet: A new service, currently in a pilot test phase, would shuttle commuters in luxurious, Wi-Fi-equipped buses to their jobs at Silicon Valley's technology campuses.
abstract: A new service, currently in a pilot test phase, would shuttle commuters in luxurious, Wi-Fi-equipped buses to their jobs at Silicon Valley's technology campuses.

headline.main: RidePal to Help Bay Area Residents Commute Like Google Employees
